features: 220° Vertical Rotation: FERRISA small fan can rotate 220° to adjust the angled airflow. This personal fan can be directed exactly where you need it, Our mini fan can portable, standable and hangable, ensuring a cool breeze all day long in small rooms. It is in classic look and good quality. This desktop fan can give you the better tactile feeling and prolong the use of the small fan for desk. just customize the angle and enjoy your cooling with this powerful small desk fan and quiet fan.

Ultra Quiet & Powerful Airflow: The Blades design of this little fan has been upgraded more bigger with new brushless motor technology and high quality ABS, Enjoy refreshing air with lower noise below 25db while running, this mini desk fan operates quietly so you can focus on your work, study or sleep.This fan combines quiet operation with strong airflow, providing cool relief even in stuffy rooms.

Light Weight &Portable & Multipurpose: F5 small electric fan weighs only 0.5lb with cordless design, lighter, thinner, and more portable. Our usb desk fan has a compact size(6.7*5.7*1.3inches), The size of the blade is 4 inch. Take this fan with you wherever you go. The fan has a hanging hole that can be a hanging fan. You can enjoy a cool day at home, office, bedroom,kitchen, beach, camping, travel or anywhere.

3 Speed & Natural Modes: Customize your experience with three adjustable speed levels and a natural wind mode.This small portable fan with 3 kinds of airflow can be adjusted by pressing the button. Choose from subtle breezes to strong gusts depending on your preference.

High Compatibility USB-powered: FERRISA mini portable fans, powered by USB design ensures high compatibility with your phone, PC/laptops, power supplies, AC adapters, car chargers, and other power supplies that support USB. making it convenient to use anywhere. (Note: This table top fan does not have a battery)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my decor
reviews.reviewText: Small, cute, doesn’t take up much room and keeps me cool!! Worth the small amount of $

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars super small but puts out a nice quiet breeze
reviews.reviewText: Incredibly small and flat, well designed, with an adjustable stand. Easy to pack, lightweight, and sturdy. Plugs in via USB and charges well. Runs completely silently. My only complaint is the small red light when it is on: can make your room not quite dark. But it is really small and I am really picky so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Desk Fan
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great for a desk space. It is a good size and can easily be stored away. It has good power and different speed options. Works really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mini fan
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Would give it a 4.5 as it does produce a sound that I, and oddly enough both of my cats, find highly annoying hahaha. It’s not that bad, produces fantastic airflow, and is so small. I love that I can tuck it into a bookcase if need be!! I have a very hot apartment and this little thing has helped cool off my living room, definitely buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is a 10/10 for me. My co-workers like it on the warmer side and I needed something I didn’t have to plug in, this was perfect. It’s small but puts out a lot of air. Love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but powerful
reviews.reviewText: it's a great size to pack with you to the pool, camping, the park, etc. it might not be the most conspicuous item; it's not really a hand holding fan that you whip out of your bag or purse, which you absolutely could! it's just a big bigger than the average hand held fan.but it has great wind capacity for the size and on the highest setting, it can run for at least 2 hours without a charge plug. it's also pretty low noise, which is always a great bonus! the only thing is that sometimes it can accidentally be turned on if you carry it with you in your bag or luggage so look out for that, not as a danger precaution so much as a it sucks if you packed it to use only to find that it's out of battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this when i'm putting on makeup. It's perfectly above my mirror and cools me down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOT CORDED - USB rechargeable.
reviews.reviewText: I was initially disappointed with this because I was looking for something that was a traditional corded fan that could be folded up into a backpack for use at school and work. However I was happily surprised how well it worked how quiet it was how easily it folded up and how long the battery lasted. I charged it fully and then turned it on high and it seemed to last up to 8 hours with a full charge I was shocked definitely an improvement from earlier rechargeable fans I have used.
